name: Don't Go Alone!
description:
A class project which was originally supposed to be an FPS but changed into a Treasure Hunt type of game for now.  Mainly to show off design, all items I created within Maya. Green trees and grass were pre-made assets. The yellow trees I made myself within Unity. 

There are 10 different items to find! Once you've found them all you've won! 

Follow the signposts, they'll point you in the right direction and stay along the dirt path keep your eyes peeled for the items off to the sides of the roads!

- Backpack

-  Coin pouch

- Torch

- Map

- Sword 

- Chicken Leg

- Helmet

- Heart

- Coin

- Shield
